messages.text: Hi Maxie. Feel free to shoot me a message here. As soon as we're mutually online we can get in touch. You've got a guest and I'm likewise on the road today!
I might need another 30-45 minutes to get ready. Are you going to be able to talk in the next hour or so?
I also emailed you a list of some questions / talking points I have for the phone call. Please give me an estimate of when you will want to talk.
I think we're going to need to continue this another day. Please email me with the times you are available for the rest of this and early next week so we can set something up.
